name: Sweet Pea: Blossoms After Summer (morri)
description:
Pea has a huge crush on their next-door-neighbor and sorta-best friend Quenton, but will they be able to admit their feelings before he leaves for college tomorrow?

This game was made in Ren'Py for COSMOS UCSC 2021 in collaboration with Ellie and Serena.

Runtime: 15-20 minutes for all 3 endings.
